tasks.all-tests: deno install && deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check src/index.ts && deno publish --allow-dirty --dry-run && deno test -A --fail-fast
tasks.patch: deno task all-tests && deno run -A src/incrementVersion.ts patch
tasks.minor: deno task all-tests && deno run -A src/incrementVersion.ts minor
tasks.major: deno-task all-testes && deno run -A src/incrementVersion.ts major
